case.name: Saki Makeup Reveal
case.description: Saki has revealed herself to be a zombie, absolutely shocking everyone.

case.name: Saki Zombie Reveal
case.description: Saki has revealed herself to be a zombie, absolutely shocking everyone.

case.name: Saki Broke
case.description: Saki fell apart. not realizing her bandages were keeping her together.

case.name: Bad Luck (prompt marker)
case.description: Saki asks what was the worst case of bad luck a character's ever had.

notes.note: You already have responses to Saki taking off her makeup, losing her head, and stuff, but I wasn't sure if you wanted to rewrite those to take into account the back and forth we've done.
